title: Orphans of the Storm - Grateful Dead soundtrack
description:
ORPHANS OF THE STORM
Silent film by D.W. Griffith
A story of the French Revolution (1921)

Soundtrack by the Grateful Dead
Recorded live at the Stanley Theater, Jersey City, NJ
September 28, 1972
Soundboard recording from the Internet Archive

I managed to salvage the best parts of the concert, apply them to this film and make both more interesting.

Video file MPEG-4 Nero digital
29.97 frames per second (NTSC)
Ripped from Alpha Video dvd (bargain basement but good)

Audio AAC-LC 256 kbs

Enjoy! Both the music and the film may be freely distributed.
